scripts.build: bun run lint && bunx tsup --config tsup.config.ts && shx mkdir -p dist && shx cp -r public/* dist/
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development bunx tsup --config tsup.config.ts --watch & shx cp -r public/* dist/
scripts.package:chrome: bun run build && shx rm -f dist/*.map dist/manifest.firefox.json dist/manifest.edge.json && cd dist && ../../../node_modules/.bin/bestzip ../RetractCheck-chrome.zip . && cd -
scripts.package:firefox: bun run build && shx rm -f dist/*.map dist/manifest.edge.json && shx cp public/manifest.firefox.json dist/manifest.json && shx rm -f dist/manifest.firefox.json && cd dist && ../../../node_modules/.bin/bestzip ../RetractCheck-firefox.xpi . && cd -
scripts.package:edge: bun run build && shx rm -f dist/*.map dist/manifest.firefox.json && shx cp public/manifest.edge.json dist/manifest.json && shx rm -f dist/manifest.edge.json && cd dist && ../../../node_modules/.bin/bestzip ../RetractCheck-edge.zip . && cd -
scripts.package: bun run package:chrome && bun run package:firefox && bun run package:edge
